messages.message:
Hey team,
Why wouldn't tester role be sufficient in review queue?

Currently, with the tester role, the deployment runs will fail with 'permission denied' Could not generate queue metadata.
team is wondering why would tester be able to use in review queue and what would be the expectation for testers in such case?
CC @suleiman.odat
CC @jack.robbins

Is there a ticket for this? The Tester role should be able to do everything a reviewer or review manager can do (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FKoupgl_zQ9RJTX6GTsyXNdlOvQkgk4Jh3vZadd-ZJw/edit?gid=0#gid=0), so this sounds like a bug.
hmm, let me file a bug ticket then.

Raising as a JIRA https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4761

Thank you!
